title: Four Seasons Resort Punta Mita Receives Top Rankings in Travel + leisure 2015 world's best awardsTravelandtourworld.com
text:
Four Seasons Resort Punta Mita ranked as top resort by Travel + leisure 2015 Published on : Tuesday, July 14, 2015
Four Seasons Resort Punta Mita, an award-winning beachfront oasis tucked into the lush landscape of the Riviera Nayarit, has been recognised as one of the top resorts in the world in the 20th annual Travel + Leisure’ 2015 World’s Best Awards. Four Seasons Resort Punta Mita was ranked #1 among the Best Hotels and Resorts in Mexico for Families, top five among the Best Hotels and Resorts in Mexico, and placed in the Top 100 World’s Best Hotels with an overall score of 93.54. Complete rankings can be viewed online and in Travel + Leisure’s August 2015 issue and digital editions.
“We are honoured to once again be recognised by the readers of Travel + Leisure as one of the best resorts in the world,” says John O’Sullivan, General Manager Four Seasons Resort Punta Mita. “It is our goal to continue to provide our guests with an incredible experience through the exceptional service by our dedicated team members and new programming and Resort enhancements, including the recent redesign of our two private beaches.”
The World’s Best Awards are a result of an extensive reader survey conducted by Travel + Leisure each year and are among the most respected reader polls in the travel industry. The magazine’s discerning readers define excellence in travel by rating their experiences and evaluating hotels across the world on the following characteristics: rooms and facilities, location, service, restaurants and food, and value. Hotel brands are rated by the following categories: locations, rooms and facilities, restaurants and food, service, design and value.
Four Seasons Resort Punta Mita is currently offering a special Stay Longer – Third Night Free package, perfect for those planning a long weekend getaway to Puerto Vallarta, including a complimentary third night with every two consecutive paid nights.
Source:-Four Seasons
